key_points: Cinematographer Halyna Hutchins was killed and director Joel Souza was injured on the set of the film 'Rust' after Alec Baldwin accidentally misfired a prop gun.
The incident occurred at the Bonanza Creek Ranch set in New Mexico.
Alec Baldwin appeared distraught in a photo following the incident.
The Santa Fe Sheriff's Department is investigating the shooting, which was reported around 1:50 p.m. local time.
Film production has been paused indefinitely by Rust Movie Productions LLC.
Rust Movie Productions LLC expressed devastation over the tragedy and offered condolences to Hutchins' family.
Counseling services will be provided to those connected to the film.
Halyna Hutchins was airlifted to the University of New Mexico Hospital, where she succumbed to her injuries.
Earlier statement from Baldwin's spokesperson mentioned an accident involving a prop gun with blanks.
Tributes have been paid to Hutchins, with colleagues highlighting her talent and personality.
